ygData.subject: Re: Welcome to EQ_women@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings! I am Beth Moursund, player of Windsong Wanderer, a female wood elf bard on Solusek Ro.  Windsong is currently struggling through the hell level
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings! I am Beth Moursund, player of Windsong Wanderer, a female wood
elf bard on Solusek Ro. Windsong is currently struggling through the "hell
level" 35, and has about one and an eighth bubbles to go. (Players under
level 30 may not have heard of "hell levels." For some reason known only
to Verant, experience progression at levels 30, 35, 40, and 45 slows to a
crawl. On the levels in between it returns to normal.)

I also have a female human monk and a male troll shaman, both currently at
9th level.

I'm interested in hearing from other female players. Also, I'm happy to
give any advice and tips I can that may be helpful to newer players.

- Beth "BethMo" Moursund
